definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji

sentences.english: Consumption rate is an important macroeconomic index used to reflect economic condition.
sentences.chinese: 消費率是反映國民經濟運行狀況的重要宏觀經濟指標。

sentences.english: The results show that macro economic variables have obvious out-of-sample explain ability.
sentences.chinese: 發現宏觀經濟變量的樣本外預測能力仍然相當的顯著。

sentences.english: This may sound like buck-passing by the world's main international macroeconomic organisation.
sentences.chinese: 這聽起來好像這個國際宏觀經濟組織在推諉責任。
我們必須重新調整宏觀經濟政策。

sentences.english: This thesis discusses pricing policy of the stockbroker companies from both macroscopical and microcosmic aspects.
sentences.chinese: 本文從宏觀經濟和微觀層面探討了券商的定價策略。

sentences.english: The fourth part is mainly about the adjustment of macroeconomy in Russia.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分集中論述的是俄羅斯宏觀經濟領域裏的調整。

sentences.english: Macroeconomic choppiness is holding back more dramatic market euphoria.
sentences.chinese: 宏觀經濟時好時壞，抑制了更樂觀的市場情緒。

sentences.english: And, that could be the macroeconomic stability," Thayer stated.
sentences.chinese: 而這個可能就是宏觀經濟的穩定。

sentences.english: The history of macroeconomics begins in intellectual struggle.
sentences.chinese: 宏觀經濟的歷史始於知識界難題。

sentences.english: Otherwise, the room to maneuver macroeconomic policy will only get smaller.
sentences.chinese: 否則，宏觀經濟政策的迴旋餘地只會變得越來越小。

sentences.english: The theory of regional economy is an important part of the macro-economic theory.
sentences.chinese: 區域經濟理論是宏觀經濟理論的重要內容之一。

sentences.english: Yale School of Management is making 'The Global Macroeconomy' a required course.
sentences.chinese: 耶魯管理學院將《全球宏觀經濟》設成了必修課。

sentences.english: The depression of macroscopical economy is considered as yield reductive main reason.
sentences.chinese: 宏觀經濟的不景氣被認爲是投資收益減少的主要原因。

sentences.english: To a great extent, the increase of macro - economics depends on the condition of consumption requirement.
sentences.chinese: 宏觀經濟增長在很大程度上取決於消費需求狀況。

sentences.english: Macro-tax rate is an important tool in adjusting macro-economy.
sentences.chinese: 宏觀稅率是調節宏觀經濟的重要工具。

sentences.english: The macroeconomy changes over to the low-heat from high fever, fluctuating range is relatively great.
sentences.chinese: 宏觀經濟從高熱轉入低迷，波動幅度較大。
